name: Plant Biosecurity
abstract: Plant Biosecurity is a set of measures designed to protect a crop, crops or a sub-group of crops from emergency plant pests at national, regional and individual farm levels.

abstract: The mission of the PO.DAAC is to preserve NASAâ€™s ocean and climate data and make these universally accessible and meaningful.

abstract: The Benchmark Energy & Geometry Database (BEGDB) collects results of highly accurate QM calculations of molecular structures, energies and properties. These data can serve as benchmarks for testing and parameterization of other computational methods.

abstract: An innovative knowledge platform dedicated to human proteins. It contains a wealth of data on all the human proteins that are produced by the 20'000 protein- coding genes found in the human genome.
